name: cli
description: CLI application template with argument parsing and command structure

files.template:
{
  "name": "{{name}}",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "{{description}}",
  "main": "dist/index.js",
  "bin": {
    "{{name}}": "./bin/{{name}}"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "build": "tsc",
    "typecheck": "tsc --noEmit",
    "dev": "tsc --watch",
    "start": "node dist/cli/index.js",
    "start:dev": "bun run src/cli/index.ts",
    "test": "bun test",
    "test:unit": "bun test tests/unit/",
    "test:integration": "bun test tests/integration/",
    "test:coverage": "bun test --coverage",
    "test:watch": "bun test --watch",
    "lint": "eslint \"src/**/*.ts\" \"tests/**/*.ts\"",
    "lint:fix": "eslint \"src/**/*.ts\" \"tests/**/*.ts\" --fix",
    "format": "prettier --write \"src/**/*.ts\" \"tests/**/*.ts\"",
    "format:check": "prettier --check \"src/**/*.ts\" \"tests/**/*.ts\"",
    "clean": "rm -rf dist node_modules coverage"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "commander": "^11.1.0",
    "chalk": "^4.1.2",
    "ora": "^5.4.1"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/node": "^24.8.0",
    "typescript": "^5.3.3",
    "bun": "latest",
    "eslint": "^8.56.0",
    "prettier": "^3.1.0"
  },
  "engines": {
    "bun": ">=1.3.0",
    "node": ">=18.0.0"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "cli",
    "command-line",
    "{{helper:kebabCase name}}"
  ],
  "author": "{{author}}",
  "license": "{{license}}"
}

{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "ES2022",
    "module": "ESNext",
    "moduleResolution": "node",
    "allowSyntheticDefaultImports": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "allowJs": true,
    "strict": {{#if (eq qualityLevel 'strict')}}true{{else}}false{{/if}},
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,
    "declaration": true,
    "declarationMap": true,
    "sourceMap": true,
    "outDir": "./dist",
    "rootDir": "./src",
    "removeComments": false,
    "noImplicitAny": {{#if (eq qualityLevel 'strict')}}true{{else}}false{{/if}},
    "noImplicitReturns": {{#if (eq qualityLevel 'medium')}}true{{else}}{{#if (eq qualityLevel 'strict')}}true{{else}}false{{/if}}{{/if}},
    "noImplicitThis": {{#if (eq qualityLevel 'strict')}}true{{else}}false{{/if}},
    "noUnusedLocals": {{#if (eq qualityLevel 'strict')}}true{{else}}false{{/if}},
    "noUnusedParameters": {{#if (eq qualityLevel 'strict')}}true{{else}}false{{/if}},
    "exactOptionalPropertyTypes": {{#if (eq qualityLevel 'strict')}}true{{else}}false{{/if}},
    "resolveJsonModule": true
  },
  "include": [
    "src/**/*"
  ],
  "exclude": [
    "node_modules",
    "dist",
    "coverage"
  ]
}

# {{helper:pascalCase name}}

{{description}}

## Installation

```bash
# Global installation
npm install -g {{name}}

# Local installation
npm install {{name}}
```

## Usage

### Command Line Interface

```bash
# Greet someone
{{name}} hello World

# Greet with capitalization
{{name}} hello --capitalize

# Check status
{{name}} status

# Get help
{{name}} --help
```

### Programmatic Usage

```typescript
import { hello } from '{{name}}';

console.log(hello('TypeScript'));
// Output: Hello, TypeScript.

console.log(hello('TypeScript', { uppercase: true, exclamation: true }));
// Output: HELLO, TYPESCRIPT!
```

## Development

```bash
# Install dependencies
bun install

# Run in development mode
bun run start:dev

# Build project
bun run build

# Start the built CLI
bun run start

# Run tests
bun test

# Run linter
bun run lint

# Format code
bun run format
```

## Commands

### `hello [name]`
Say hello to someone.

- **name**: Name to greet (default: "World")
- **Options**:
  - `-c, --capitalize`: Capitalize the greeting

### `status`
Show application status and environment information.
